trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Lisbon
There were no other sightings in Lisbon on or around June 6th 2007
divs: sighting detailswhile leaving my apartment building to go to work, i looked up at the sky to the east, and saw a small object about 1500ft agl and 1\4 mile away moving to the south-southeast very slowly. this object was black in color, metallic, and had the appearance of a large wavy bubble. the sun reflected off of it every so often, which makes me believe that it had a dull coating underneath. this object made no sound. after maintaining it's course to the south-southeast, my view was disrupted by a stand of trees. after re-positioning myself, i saw the object again. however, my view only lasted a few seconds, as the trees once again occluded my view. i got in my vehicle to go to work, and tried to find the object again. my route took me along a near-parrallel course with the object, but i was unable to locate it after about a minute.
